subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: High-flying Everton came crashing back to earth yesterday with a 1-0 defeat at Reading in the English Premier League. Stephen Hunt scored for Reading before halftime. Everton had won its first two games. In other games, Tottenham Hotspur beat newly promoted Derby County, 4-0; Wigan Athletic handed Roy Keane’s Sunderland its first loss with a 3-0 victory; and Portsmouth kept Bolton winless with a 3-1 victory.
